description: Landon and Philip have been hanging out for the past couple of days, and they get along really well. We asked what they’ve been doing together, and Landon looked at wide-eyed Philip, “Uhh, just talking mostly…playing video games…” Of course, that’s what they’re calling it these days. Philip was so eager to get fucked, that he was ready to end the interview and jump on Landon’s dick right then and there. Landon finally gave Philip a cock up his ass, and you could see in his face that he’d been waiting for it all day! Ask and you shall receive…again and again!
title: Landon & Philip: Bareback
